entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
